name: semiweekly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
occurring twice a week: They attend couples counselling sessions on a semi-weekly basis. As part of their jobs at the magazine, writers and editors must attend semiweekly editorial meetings.
More examplesFewer examplesHis semiweekly email newsletter is full of advice about publication for new writers.

twice a week : The board met semi-weekly to discuss matters pertaining to the museum. He writes a column about legal matters that appears semiweekly on the news site.
